page.title: 10GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: {RUNOUTS -}You have about ten people and you group into five. You send five people to count to 50. Try to catch them before getting to a fence which is home.If they get three home they run out again.If we catch them,then we have a turn to run out. {BRITISH BULLDOG -}One person is chosen.There is a wall or fence etc. each side of the playground or field. You have to get from one side to the other side without the person who is chasing you. If you get caught you join the person who is chasing the people who are playing. In {P.E.}we do a variety of activities-Netball,Hockey,Tennis,Round ers,Soccer,Rugby,Cricket,Gymnastics,Ba sketball,Swimming,Athletics,Cross Country....by Kadine Pearce,Natasha Falvey,Debbie Pickett,Lindsay Chapron.
